message:
I need a good Arabic morphology API.
What I need exactly is to input an Arabic word, and the result would be if this word a verb or a noun or if it's a dual or a single  ... etc.
I'm not looking to do anything from the start, I need an API to do this, or at least help me to reach this.
I found a lot of tools when I search, but I'm not sure which ones are good, anyone tried anything related to this before?

data.message: Try asking a stack overflow question

did you tried WordNet ? https://wordnet.princeton.edu/
there is a section for other languages in the menu (Arabic included), as i remember one of my friends did some thing like that with their Python NLTK Interface in the NLP course.
If you didn't find one, Try to build your own, http://nlp.stanford.edu/projects/arabic.shtml
